snippet: Jonathan Biss, the artist in residence at the center, feels the force of the legendary composer’s personality....
abstract: Classical pianist Jonathan Biss will be artist in residence for three days during Caramoor Center for Music and Arts' 71st summer festival in Katonah; Biss, whose long history with musical institution dates back to rising-star residency in 1998, will present New York premiere of Timo Andres work Banister, collaborate with two orchestras and perform with his mom, violinist Miriam Fried (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Biss, the artist in residence at the center, feels the force of the legendary composer’s personality.

headline.print_headline: At Caramoor, a Pianist’s Many Happy Returns
headline.main: Familiar Pianist at Caramoor, and Beethoven’s Gravitational Pull

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Caramoor Center for Music and the Arts
